price: 208. Nous n’avons détruit aucune cité qui n’ait déjà eu des avertisseurs
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
